com.mesosphere.sdk.curator

Class CuratorConfigStore<T extends Configuration>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.curator.CuratorConfigStore<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The Configuration object to be serialized and deserialized in the implementation of this interface
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigStore<T>, ConfigTargetStore

    public class CuratorConfigStore<T extends Configuration>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConfigStore<T>
    A CuratorConfigStore stores String Configurations in Zookeeper. The ZNode structure in Zookeeper is as follows: rootPath -> ConfigTarget (contains UUID) -> Configurations/ -> [Config-ID-0] (contains serialized config) -> [Config-ID-1] (contains serialized config) -> ...

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Creates a new ConfigStore which uses Curator with a default RetryPolicy and connection string.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear(java.util.UUID id)
      Deletes the configuration with the provided UUID, or does nothing if no matching configuration is found.
      void close() 
      T fetch(java.util.UUID id)
      Retrieves and deserializes the Configuration assigned to the provided UUID, or throws an exception if no config with the provided UUID was found.
      java.util.UUID getTargetConfig()
      Returns the current ID of the active target configuration, or throws an exception if none is set.
      java.util.Collection<java.util.UUID> list()
      Returns a list of all stored configuration UUIDs, or an empty list if none are found.
      void setTargetConfig(java.util.UUID id)
      Stores the ID of the active target configuration, replacing any current value.
      java.util.UUID store(T config)
      Serializes the provided Configuration using its Configuration.getBytes() function, writes it to storage, and returns the UUID which it was stored against.
